Quick Start Guide

You want to run interactive jupyter notebooks in a blog post? It’s never been easier.

Here is an example:

print("Hello!")
1+1
%matplotlib inline
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x = np.linspace(0,10)
plt.plot(x, np.sin(x))
plt.plot(x, np.cos(x))
